hanze.PIV1E.leertaak2.actor

Class Fire

  • java.lang.Object
    • hanze.PIV1E.leertaak2.actor.Fire
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor

    public class Fire
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actor
    A simple model of a Fire. Fire have a age, move and die.
    Version:
    01/02/2015
    Author:
    Tsjeard de Winter en Rick van der Poel
